entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Light up `Ascii.Utility` methods with `Vector512` code paths. #89280
  • Add optimization for scalar conversion of `float`/`double` to `ulong`. #89279
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Garbage HRESULT Returned without PreserveSig #89276
  • Configuration binding source generator doesn't handle generics correctly #89273
    8.0.0
  • GC deadlock on spawning new process on OSX #89272
  • ComInterfaceGenerator assumes [In, Out] for arrays of blittable elements that are pinned in ManagedToUnmanaged, but doesn't implement [In, Out] in UnmanagedToManaged #89265
  • [API Proposal]: Add extensions to create an OptionsBuilder with ValidateOnStart support #89263
    8.0.0
  • `Uri.GetLeftPart(Authority)` returns a wrong result for some schemes #89262
    Future
  • [perf] Microsoft.Extensions** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89252
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Collections.** and System.Buffers.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89251
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Globalization.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89250
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.IO.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89249
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Linq.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89248
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Memory.Span.** and System.Memory.ReadOnly.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89247
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Numerics.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89246
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Runtime.Intrinsics.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89245
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Security.Cryptography.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89244
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Tests.Perf.** and System.Perf.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89243
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Text.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89242
    8.0.0
  • [perf] Overview of Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89238
    8.0.0
  • [Android][Test Failure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpMetricsTest_Http11_Async.AllSocketsHttpHandlerCounters_Success_Recorded #89237
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 28 Regressions on 7/18/2023 1:13:00 AM #89259
  • Move tests from full facade assemblies into type forward destination #89230
  • Thread statics are no longer visible in debugger #89227
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Supply set of TypeConverters during configuration binding #89254
  • Add optimization for vector conversion of `uint`/`ulong` to `float`/`double`. #89277
  • HttpClient changes the case of x-request-id when it is added to the DefaultRequestHeaders collection #89256
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: HttpMethod.From(string) #89161
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen with loop #75442
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Late expansion of delegate calls can reorder null checks with other argument exceptions #75832
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Utf8ParserTests #89261
  • ICorProfilerCallback.AssemblyUnloadStarted is never called #86178
    8.0.0
  • Add the support of DateOnly and TimeOnly types in TryParse method Utf8Parser class #53768
    Future
  • DI : add support to eager load a singleton service #43149
    8.0.0
  • PublishAot with a specific Runtime version is broken #89040
  • Regressions in System.Formats.Tar.Tests.Perf_TarFile #88672
    8.0.0
  • Follow up on TarEntry feedback from PR #87534 #87835
    8.0.0
  • PerformanceCounterCategory.ReadCategory is taking large memory allocation #79660
    Future
  • Unable to TarFile.ExtractToDirectoryAsync when it contains symbolic link file points to an absolute path #86724
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Make LargeArrayBuilder public #87361
  • [API Proposal]: Recover JsonNode from string path #87749
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - Incorrect optimization prints `35514` instead of `28876` #85382
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_84693/Runtime_84693/Runtime_84693.dll #85081
    8.0.0
  • Unable to clean up running docker containers #87323
    8.0.0
  • [release/3.1] CI Failure: System.Diagnostics.EventLog #77234
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Ship IPNetwork downlevel for netstandard2.0 #88965
    8.0.0
  • Process.WaitForExit always times out after a different particular process runs #88862
  • Scoped service should not be resolvable from root provider #89109
    8.0.0
  • 1sec Long Pause (stop-the-world) on Gen1 GC #88426
    9.0.0
  • [Android] Uncaught exception crashes an app without printing correct stack trace #69601
    8.0.0
  • Stream.Read - document 0-byte reads #89233
  • R2R: Cache target of indirect cell address to optimize redundant cell address loading #38890
    Future
  • CI failure in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests - Operation timeout #75611
    8.0.0
  • Test failure in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SyncHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_Cancellation_Test.GetAsync_CancelDuringResponseBodyReceived_Unbuffered_TaskCanceledQuickly #74122
    8.0.0
  • SslStream now does zero byte read of InnerStream which breaks WCF #88792
    8.0.0
  • "native" instruction set alias for AOT compilers #73246
    8.0.0
  • Trimming and extensions compatibility design – discussion #86649
    8.0.0
  • Support more date-time formats for JSON deserialization #85545
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix TraceSwitch to synchronize the Value and Level properties #89278
    area-System.Diagnostics.TraceSource, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix handling of filter successors #89275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize MemoryMarshal.ToEnumerable for arrays and strings #89274
    area-System.Memory
  • Trying to add a win/arm64 job for wbt #89271
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • [NativeAOT] Upstream some changes to portable allocation helpers #89269
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add workaround for broken SPNEGO in IBM WebSphere #89268
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Use managed NTLM/SPNEGO on Apple platforms by default #89267
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-preview7] Filter list of candidate invocations for parsing in binding generator #89266
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE] Investigate returning ConnectionError instead NameResolution #89260
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Implement new streaming APIs for the `System.Net.Http.Json` extensions #89258
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` calendar data #89255
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [Android] Enable skipped networking tests #89232
    area-System.Net, os-android, 8.0.0
  • Fix GC hole with `filter` liveness #89228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Add HttpMethod.Parse #89270
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Cache memory dependencies for VN map selects #89241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Expand inlined delegate calls in correct order #89175
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump main version to RC1 #89151
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fire AssemblyUnloadStarted event #87890
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-preview7] Workaround a C++/CLI bug involving DIMs #89264
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 8.0.0
  • Workaround a C++/CLI bug involving DIMs #89253
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Filter list of candidate invocations for parsing in binding generator #89226
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add lock when allocating from method mempool #89231
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [JIT] Fix - Do not remove `CAST` nodes on store if the `LCL_VAR` is a parameter or struct field #85734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Finish fixing PerfBDNApp, continuation of #89057 #89135
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] Allow download retry+throttling in unified code with blazor #88910
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Enable CLS Compliance on Diagnostics Libraries #89214
    area-System.Diagnostics, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview7] Remove more duplicate assets from NativeAOT runtime pack build #89240
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Remove more duplicate assets from NativeAOT runtime pack build #89239
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Efcore issue 31178 #89185
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Fix incorrect nativeaot event thread / sequence number on shutdown #88941
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • SBLK_MASK_LOCK_THREADID allow tid up to 65535 #88772
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Broaden use of SearchValues in TryFindNextPossibleStartingPosition in Regex #89205
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • [AndroidAppBuilder] add missing includes to template #89197
    os-android, area-Build-mono
  • Add support for `--instruction-set:native` #87865
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reduce ProbabilisticWithAsciiCharSearchValues overhead on non-ASCII texts #89224
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • Point ActiveIssues to moved issues #89158
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add more tests for complex dict element binding by generator #89210
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Virt call unsafe accessor tests #89220
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 8.0.0
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use live illink for trimming tests #88929
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Generates a guid for activity id #88838
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT createdump fork/exec for crash dump generation #89203
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable IOPack, IOEnqueue, and IODequeue on Windows #88894
    area-System.Threading
  • [Mono][WIP] UnsafeAccessor: Support ambiguous method match #89217
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix GetArgLoc #88657
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Allow multiple kmask registers to be allocated and cleanup some codegen around them #89059
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle Vector multiplication for long/ulong as intrinsic on pre-AVX512 hardware #87142
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unbox a true nullable without Opcodes.Unbox #89108
    area-System.Reflection
  • Don't fallback to PNSE, and give a more descriptive error message. #88804
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • Move full facade assemblies into src/libraries/shims #89184
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement RandomAccess.FlushToDisk() #89100
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add the interop tags to the "add to the AppModel project" automation #89221
    area-Meta
  • [mono][jit] Enabled more intrinsics for V4 on arm64 #88912
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix issue references in ConvertToLibraryImportAnalyzerTests #89225
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Enable use-after-return checking in ASAN #89204
    area-Infrastructure
  • Try to improve EventSource_ParallelRequests_LogsNewConnectionIdForEachRequest reliability #89192
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Write perfmap and jitdump files to /tmp by default [6.0 port] #88486
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.21
  • [release/6.0-staging] dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #88664
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.21
  • Write perfmap and jitdump files to /tmp by default [7.0 port] #89053
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.11
  • Use utf conversions from minipal #89036
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Try to fix missing libc++.so.1 errors in arm64 llvmaot perf run #88705
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Include TypeNameBuilder.cs from CoreLib instead of copying the file over #89144
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Combine writes in `WidenAsciiToUtf16` #88502
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Add Unsafe.IsAddressLess/GreaterThanOrEqualTo methods #89156
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix NaN canonicalization issue #88510
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Remove incorrect flag setting #88878
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Flow TasksConfiguration in build & specify generator config #84931
    area-Infrastructure
  • adding clrgc variant with regions enabled #89129
    area-GC-coreclr
  • add SendTo/ReceiveFrom with SocketAddress #88970
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Address unused suppressions #89216
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
